Account registration was a success.\n Your account is now pending activation.\nPlease wait until one of our customer service representatives activate your account and then you can login.

Seems your account is not either deactivated or is pending activation.

 If your account is pending activation, please wait until one of our customer service representatives activate your account and then you can login.

 If you have deactivated your account and want to reactivate it, please contact one of our customer service representatives directly.
